about_the_game:
Hello to all Side42 adventurers!
We are thrilled to present the demo of our game Side42. This exclusive demo offers you an immersive glimpse of what the full game has in store. Here’s what you will find in this demo version:

Start of the Game: Discover the beginnings of our story and start exploring the world that awaits you.

Tutorial: Learn the basics of the game with our integrated tutorial. Master the controls and strategies necessary to survive and progress in Side42.

Level 1: Dive into action with the complete first level. Face your first challenges and discover the game mechanics that make Side42 a unique experience.

Level 2: Continue the adventure with the second level, where running without thinking might be the best option.

Special Bonus: To thank you for your support, we have included a little bonus in this demo. Explore to find out what it is!

We hope this demo will make you eager to dive even deeper into the world of Side42. Your feedback is essential for us to refine the game and make it as extraordinary as possible.

Enjoy the game, everyone!
